WHAT I'M READING

Things I’m reading this week:

A dozen things I’ve learned from Vinod Khosla - @ Point Of View (Khosla Ventures’ “blag/option page”) by Tren Griffin

How to Ruin Your Company with One Bad Process - @ Ben’s Blog by Ben Horowitz

Still Life with James T. Kirk - @ The Magazine by David J Loehr

Africa in the News: International Efforts to Stem Ebola Intensify; Peacekeeping Mission in the Central African Republic Transfers to U.N. Leadership; U.N. Agencies Report on Food Insecurity in Africa - @ The Brookings Institution by Amy Copley 1

Small- and Medium-Sized Enterprise Finance in Africa - by Thorsten Beck, Robert Cull

  1. Amy is a Research Assistant with Africa Growth Initiative at The Brookings Instituation. ↩
